affixList.2150311: When current HP increases or decreases, CRIT Rate will be increased by 12% for 5s. Max 3 stacks.

EQUIP_BRACER.name: Hunter's Brooch
EQUIP_BRACER.description: An ancient emblem that was once awarded to those who had made exceptional contributions in battle.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.name: Masterpiece's Overture
EQUIP_NECKLACE.description: A portable tool used to adjust the torque on some old-school clockwork machine. It has since lost its practical value.

EQUIP_SHOES.name: Moment of Judgment
EQUIP_SHOES.description: A standard pocket watch. Its accuracy is not particularly high.

EQUIP_RING.name: Forgotten Vessel
EQUIP_RING.description: A portable metal vessel containing strong wine. Can be stuffed into the pocket of an outer coat for ease of access and use.

EQUIP_DRESS.name: Veteran's Visage
EQUIP_DRESS.description: An old mask that can, to some extent, stand in for a face marred by wounds. Its design can vary based on the wounded areas and the user's gender.
